title: Scarecrows (Full Movie) Horror, Action, 1988 | 80s classic horror

sources.title: Scarecrows (Full Movie) Horror, Action, 1988 | 80s classic horror
sources.description:
Five crooks rob an army base payroll and kidnap a pilot and his daughter, who are forced to fly them to Mexico.  One crook parachutes out with the money--followed closely by the others.  They didn't expect to land in a cemetery populated by killer scarecrows, though...

Starring Ted Vernon, Michael Simms, Richard Vidan, Mike Balog, David James Campbell
Directed by William Wesley

Released straight to home video VHS in 1988

Listed by Buzzfeed as one of "30 Forgotten Horror Films That Are Worth Revisiting"

Edited for YouTube ad standards
